mapper.select:
select a.menucode as menucode ,a.menuname as menuname ,a.menupath as menupath ,a.menutype as menutype ,b.auth as menuauth from tb_webview_menu a left outer join tb_webview_menuauth b on a.menucode = b.menucode where 1=1
order by a.menuorder

select a.viewcode as viewcode ,a.name as viewname ,a.useYn as useYn ,a.`path` as viewpath ,a.`level` as viewlevel ,b.auth as viewauth ,IFNULL(b.searchYn,'N') as searchYn ,IFNULL(b.saveYn,'N') as saveYn ,IFNULL(b.deleteYn,'N') as deleteYn from tb_webview_view a left outer join tb_webview_viewauth b on a.viewcode = b.viewcode where a.menucode = #{menucode}

select row_number() over(order by createDt) as rownum ,mst_cd as mstCd ,mst_nm as mstNm ,use_yn as useYn ,remark ,attr1 ,attr2 ,attr3 from tb_common_code_mst where 1=1
and mst_cd like concat('%', #{mstCd}, '%')
select row_number() over(order by createDt) as rownum ,mst_cd ,dtl_cd ,dtl_nm ,use_yn ,remark ,attr1 ,attr2 ,attr3 from tb_common_code_dtl where 1=1 and mst_cd = #{mstCd}
